a.n: Nouvelle-calédonie, Vanuatu - Archipels Sacrés De Mélanésie VI

p.d: "L'Austral", a cruise-expedition ship, heads for the archipelagos of New Caledonia and Vanuatu. With a team of naturalists and scientists as our guides, we discover these far-flung islands whose inhabitants are proud of their cultural roots. Director: Alain Dayan, Christophe Boyer (France, 2017)
